text: Ani jyanna amhi grantha pradana kela ahe, te tara tyadvare khupa anandita hotata, je kahi tumacyavara avatarita kele jate ani itara sampradaya, tyatalya kahi gostinna man'ya karita nahi. Tumhi tyanna sanguna taka ki mala tara kevala haca adesa dila gela ahe ki mi allahaci upasana karavi ani tyacyasobata konala bhagidara na banavave, mi tyacyacakade bolavita ahe ani tyacyacakade mala paratuna jayace ahe
